label: ABC2_hR4_166_a_b_c-009
title: $\alpha$-NaFeO$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
This is also referred to as O3-NaFeO$_{2}$. 
 This structure is related to \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hP8_186_b_b_ab-001}{O2-LiCoO$_{2}$}, \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hP16_186_ab_ab_a3b-001}{O4-LiCoO$_{2}$}, and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC2D4_hP18_194_f_a_cd_ef-001}{OP4-LiNaCo$_{2}$O$_{4}$}. 
 $\alpha$-NaFeO$_{2}$ has the same AFLOW Label, ABC2\_hR4\_166\_a\_b\_c, as \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hR4_166_a_b_c-004}{rhombohedral delafossite, CuFeO$_{2}$}, \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hR4_166_a_b_c-001}{caswellsilverite ($F5_{1}$)} and \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hR4_166_a_b_c-010}{LiNiO$_{2}$}.  The difference in the internal parameter $z_{3}$ causes a large change in the bonding of the crystals, so we present them as different structures. 
 The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
